thread.title: David Beckham steps out with five-year-old daughter Harper and her £595 personalised Burberry blanket
thread.title_full: David Beckham steps out with five-year-old daughter Harper and her £595 personalised Burberry blanket

author: Emma Pryer
title: David Beckham steps out with five-year-old daughter Harper and her £595 personalised Burberry blanket
text:
Harper Beckham wearing the Burberry blanket with her initials HSB at New York's JFK Airport today (Photo: Splash News) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
David Beckham hasn’t had much luck keeping things under wraps lately – but he’s getting the hang of it now as he covers up in a cosy scarf. 
Goldenballs seems to take a lead from daughter Harper , who keeps warm in a £595 Burberry blanket personalised with her initials HSB, as she strides ahead holding his hand at New York's JFK airport. 
The five-year-old dressed down out in the city later, wearing a woolly hat like brothers Cruz, 11, and Burberry model Romeo, 14 – who also wore a scarf from the brand. Harper Beckham and David Beckham (Photo: Splash News) Read More Victoria Beckham slips on ice as she’s caught in snow storm in New York 
They could teach mum Victoria a thing or two about dressing for winter in the city. 
The designer, 42, braved the snowy streets without her coat as she prepared for her Fashion Week show there today. David Beckham, Romeo James Beckham, Cruz Beckham, Harper Seven Beckham leaving The Edition Hotel today (Photo: Startraks photo) 
A shiver went through Brand Beckham last week as hacked emails were released in which ex-England captain David allegedly moaned about missing out on a knighthood. 
But his close-knit family ensure he’ll never be left out in the cold. Victoria Beckham looks casual chic as she leaves her hotel in New York City (Photo: Splash News) Like us on Facebook
